instructions.name: approve_work
docs: Poster approves submitted work - releases funds immediately

instructions.name: assign_worker
docs: Assign a worker to the escrow (called by poster or platform)

instructions.name: auto_release
docs: Auto-release funds after review window expires

instructions.name: cancel_escrow
docs: Cancel escrow before worker assigned

instructions.name: cast_arbitration_vote
docs: Cast a vote on a dispute case

instructions.name: claim_expired
docs: Claim expired escrow - poster can reclaim after expiry

instructions.name: claim_expired_arbitration
docs: Emergency release for expired arbitrations (H-2 fix)
If arbitration extends past escrow expiry + grace period, poster can reclaim funds

instructions.name: close_arbitrator_account
docs: Close an inactive arbitrator account - returns rent to agent

accounts.name: agent
docs: Rent returned to the arbitrator agent

instructions.name: close_dispute_case
docs: Close a dispute case after execution - returns rent to initiator

accounts.name: initiator
docs: Rent returned to the original dispute initiator

instructions.name: close_escrow
docs: Close escrow account and reclaim rent

instructions.name: create_escrow
docs: Create escrow for a job - poster deposits SOL
# Arguments
* `job_id` - Unique identifier for the job (max 64 chars)
* `job_id_hash` - SHA256 hash of job_id (for PDA derivation)
* `amount` - Amount of SOL in lamports to deposit
* `expiry_seconds` - Optional custom expiry (defaults to 30 days)

instructions.name: execute_dispute_resolution
docs: Execute dispute resolution - transfer funds based on outcome
Also updates reputation for winner/loser

accounts.name: executor
docs: Anyone can execute after finalization

instructions.name: finalize_dispute_case
docs: Finalize dispute after voting (anyone can call after deadline or when majority reached)

accounts.name: finalizer
docs: Anyone can finalize after deadline or majority

instructions.name: init_arbitrator_pool
docs: Initialize the arbitrator pool (platform only, one-time)

instructions.name: init_reputation
docs: Initialize a reputation account for an agent

instructions.name: initiate_dispute
docs: Initiate a dispute (by poster or platform) - starts timelock

instructions.name: raise_dispute_case
docs: Raise a dispute case - selects 5 random arbitrators

instructions.name: refund_to_poster
docs: Refund to poster - ONLY platform authority can call, requires timelock passed

instructions.name: register_arbitrator
docs: Register as an arbitrator (requires stake)

instructions.name: release_to_worker
docs: Release funds to worker - ONLY platform authority can call this
Takes 1% platform fee, sends 99% to worker
Updates reputation for both parties

instructions.name: release_with_reputation
docs: Release funds with reputation update (preferred over raw release_to_worker)

instructions.name: remove_arbitrator
docs: Remove an arbitrator from the pool (platform authority only)
Returns their stake - use for bad actors

accounts.name: arbitrator_agent
docs: The arbitrator's wallet - receives stake back

accounts.name: authority
docs: Platform authority - only they can remove arbitrators

instructions.name: submit_work
docs: Worker submits completed work - starts 24h review window

instructions.name: unregister_arbitrator
docs: Unregister as arbitrator and reclaim stake

instructions.name: update_arbitrator_accuracy
docs: Update arbitrator accuracy after dispute resolution (C-1 fix)
Creates AccuracyClaim PDA to prevent duplicate calls

accounts.name: accuracy_claim
docs: AccuracyClaim PDA - prevents duplicate accuracy claims (C-1 fix)

accounts.name: caller
docs: Caller pays for AccuracyClaim PDA rent

errors.name: WorkerAlreadyAssigned
errors.msg: Worker already assigned to this escrow

errors.name: NoWorkerAssigned
errors.msg: No worker assigned to this escrow

errors.name: WorkerMismatch
errors.msg: Worker address does not match escrow

errors.name: PosterMismatch
errors.msg: Poster address does not match escrow

errors.name: NotPlatformAuthority
errors.msg: Only platform authority can perform this action

errors.name: RefundNotAllowed
errors.msg: Refund not allowed in current state

errors.name: TimelockNotPassed
errors.msg: Dispute timelock has not passed (24h required)

errors.name: CannotClose
errors.msg: Cannot close escrow in current state

errors.name: NotPendingReview
errors.msg: Escrow is not in pending review state

errors.name: ReviewWindowNotExpired
errors.msg: Review window has not expired yet (24h required)

errors.name: NotSelectedArbitrator
errors.msg: Not selected as arbitrator for this case

errors.name: VotingNotComplete
errors.msg: Voting not complete (no majority and deadline not passed)

errors.name: HashMismatch
errors.msg: Job ID hash does not match provided job ID

errors.name: ArbitratorDidNotVote
errors.msg: Arbitrator did not vote on this dispute

errors.name: DisputeNotExecuted
errors.msg: Dispute has not been executed yet

errors.name: ArbitratorStillActive
errors.msg: Arbitrator is still active - unregister first

errors.name: ArbitratorStillInPool
errors.msg: Arbitrator is still in the pool

errors.name: ArbitrationGracePeriodNotPassed
errors.msg: Arbitration grace period has not passed (48h after expiry)

types.name: AccuracyClaim
docs: Tracks accuracy claims to prevent duplicate calls (C-1 fix)
